item.description: Short Bio Peter Kinget is the Bernard J. Lechner Professor of Electrical Engineering at Columbia University in New York. He received his engineering and Ph.D. degrees in electrical engineering from the Katholieke Universiteit in Leuven (Belgium). His research group focusses on the design of analog and RF integrated circuits in scaled technologies and the novel systems or applications they enable in communications, sensing, and power management. Contact Peter Kinget Bernard J.
